publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-269# Colin Fox: Consultation on Tax Powersâ€”That the Parliament supports the call by its former Presiding Officer, Sir David Steel, for the Parliament to be given increased tax powers and believes that the Scottish Executive should institute a consultation on the tax powers that the public considers would best be transferred to the Parliament from Westminster. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-269# Consultation on Tax Powers (lodged on 19 August 2003) Rosie Kane*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-269# Consultation on Tax Powers (lodged on 19 August 2003) Donald Gorrie*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-269# Consultation on Tax Powers (lodged on 19 August 2003) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-269# Consultation on Tax Powers (lodged on 19 August 2003) John Swinburne*
